column5: Was in the Markham location this morning. Still lots of lures including Muskie stuff. Staff were still unpacking more Rapalas to hang on walls. Lures 40% off. 30% for most of the rest. There goes another $100. $60 actually ?
Thanks for the heads up Cap't.  Yeah, I'm still getting LeBaron's emails. If I don't go north this weekend I may go east to the Mississauga store.
Thanks....
Thanks for the heads up Cap't.  Yeah, I'm still getting LeBaron's emails. If I don't go north this weekend I may go east to the Mississauga store.  Same here. Might head there today.
Le Baron Mississauga 50% Off Entire Store  https://www.facebook.com/PUMPKNOWS/photos/pcb.1812030759077006/1812029955743753/?type=3&theater  ^^^ Scroll right to see what lures they still have in stock
Ottawa store is picked pretty clean. Too bad, I liked LB'S
Markham store getting down with stock but still decent selection of crank baits. Including Rapalas. Some Muskie stuff still too. 40% off.
Last day to shop at Mississauga store is saturday.  All unsold inventory will be shipped to the Markham location.  I was told Markham will be open for 2 more weeks.
Mississauga now 60% off  https://www.facebook.com/PUMPKNOWS/photos/a.1559411764338908.1073741828.1540722636207821/1813525225594226/?type=3&theater
psssst   heard they will re open the Markham store only, building a new building which they will own instead of leasing the buildings they are now in, heard from a source within the organiization
That would be a good thing, for me at least.
good news. I did not compare literally, but they had better prices for some stuff. I always bought Power Pro lines there.
This would be good news to me too.

for their own good the new store better be open Sundays.. Retail business thrive on weekend business. Not being open Sundays just means your customers go to Bass Pro or Sail or whatever for their weekend shopping..
Forget open Sundays.  What they need is an online presence that does not consist of pdf links.

Forget open Sundays. What they need is an online presence that does not consist of pdf links. Or an environment that doesn't make the customer feel like they are being hounded, to ensure that they don't steal anything! HH
I've never had that feeling there, you must look shady or something ?

psssst   heard they will re open the Markham store only, building a new building which they will own instead of leasing the buildings they are now in, heard from a source within the organiization  I hope this is true
I've never had that feeling there, you must look shady or something Could be the mask! HH

Visited the Markham store 1st time since the out-of-business new was released.  It was very sad to see a store I have spent years of my time at has become almost empty and to learn employees I have become friends with over the years are moving on as well.  I hope they have learned their lessons and make necessary adjustments to be a contender to other big-brand stores.

Believe they are done and doors closed here in Ottawa now.  Always liked LeB's.  Personally never an issue with service.  Mail order was excellent all the way to Attawapiskat and Moose Factory during those years too.  Too bad.
Goodbye, LeBaron.
Did anyone pick up anything at 75% off?
I forgot!  Too late now
